snippets.name: Bond Prep
snippets.html:
I prepared bond hearing packet (support letters, evidence, legal brief) for the client.

{key:tab}

Prepared bond hearing packet (support letters, evidence, legal brief) for the client.

snippets.name: Document Request
snippets.html:
I requested supporting documents from the client (e.g., IDs, police reports, proof of residence).

{key:tab}

Requested supporting documents from the client (e.g., IDs, police reports, proof of residence).

snippets.name: Stay of Removal Prep
snippets.html:
I prepared and filed stay of removal request (I-246) for the client.

{key:tab}

Prepared and filed stay of removal request (I-246) for the client.

snippets.name: ICE Check-In
snippets.html:
I attended ICE check-in with the client; provided updates and advocated for release/deferral.

{key:tab}

Attended ICE check-in with the client; provided updates and advocated for release/deferral.

snippets.name: Stay of Removal Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a stay of removal request.

{key:tab}

I prepared supporting evidence and documented the basis for a stay.

snippets.name: Bond Hearing
snippets.html:
I appeared at bond hearing; presented arguments for release and ability to pay.

{key:tab}

Appeared at bond hearing; presented arguments for release and ability to pay.

snippets.name: Custody Location Updated
snippets.html:
I confirmed the detention facility location.

{key:tab}

I verified transfer status and updated the case file and contacts.

snippets.name: Prosecutorial Discretion Request Submitted
snippets.html:
I submitted a request for prosecutorial discretion to ICE counsel.

{key:tab}

I presented equities, humanitarian factors, and case posture in support of favorable discretion.

snippets.name: Removal Warning Noted
snippets.html:
I documented receipt of a removal warning.

{key:tab}

I advised on compliance steps and explored available legal options.

snippets.name: Order of Supervision Reviewed
snippets.html:
I reviewed an order of supervision.

{key:tab}

I explained conditions, reporting schedule, and consequences for non‑compliance.

snippets.name: Call with ICE Counsel
snippets.html:
I spoke with ICE counsel about case posture.

{key:tab}

I discussed possible stipulations, scheduling, or prosecutorial discretion.

snippets.name: Repatriation Preparation
snippets.html:
I prepared for repatriation logistics.

{key:tab}

I coordinated travel documents, personal effects, and family notifications as appropriate.

snippets.name: Supervision Reporting Update
snippets.html:
I updated supervision reporting details.

{key:tab}

I confirmed frequency, method of reporting, and any special instructions.

snippets.name: Bag Check and Travel Documents Reviewed
snippets.html:
I reviewed bag‑check and travel document requirements for a scheduled removal.

{key:tab}

I confirmed logistics, collected necessary documents, and noted reporting instructions.

snippets.name: ICE Check‑In Attended
snippets.html:
I attended a supervision check‑in with ICE.

{key:tab}

I confirmed reporting requirements and the next check‑in date.

snippets.name: Prosecutorial Discretion
snippets.html:
I drafted and submitted prosecutorial discretion request to OPLA/ICE.

{key:tab}

Drafted and submitted prosecutorial discretion request to OPLA/ICE.

snippets.name: Bond Follow-Up
snippets.html:
I updated the client/family after bond decision; explained payment or appeal options.

{key:tab}

Updated the client/family after bond decision; explained payment or appeal options.

snippets.name: ICE Custody Check
snippets.html:
I communicated with ICE to confirm custody status or transfer for the client.

{key:tab}

Communicated with ICE to confirm custody status or transfer for the client.

snippets.name: Family Update
snippets.html:
I call with family of the client re: custody status, next hearing, or bond.

{key:tab}

Call with family of the client re: custody status, next hearing, or bond.

snippets.name: Bond Packet Prepared
snippets.html:
I prepared a bond hearing packet.

{key:tab}

I compiled support letters, financial documents, and a legal memorandum for the bond hearing.

snippets.name: Bond Memorandum Drafted
snippets.html:
I drafted a legal memorandum in support of bond.

{key:tab}

I analyzed flight risk and danger factors and proposed conditions of release.

snippets.name: Bond Exhibits Gathered
snippets.html:
I gathered exhibits for a bond hearing.

{key:tab}

I organized documents demonstrating community ties, residence, and stability.

snippets.name: Bond Decision Follow‑Up
snippets.html:
I followed up after a bond decision.

{key:tab}

I explained the outcome, payment or appeal options, and next steps.

snippets.name: Bond Appeal Filed
snippets.html:
I filed an appeal of the bond decision.

{key:tab}

I prepared the notice, grounds for appeal, and requested the required transcript if applicable.

snippets.name: ICE Custody Status Confirmed
snippets.html:
I confirmed custody or transfer status with ICE.

{key:tab}

I contacted the appropriate office and documented facility and next steps.

snippets.name: Parole Request Filed
snippets.html:
I filed a request for parole from detention.

{key:tab}

I submitted supporting evidence and humanitarian factors for release.

snippets.name: Bond Hearing Preparation
snippets.html:
I prepared for a bond hearing before the Immigration Court.

{key:tab}

I organized the packet, prepared talking points, and coordinated family attendance.

snippets.name: Bond Conditions Reviewed
snippets.html:
I reviewed bond conditions and reporting requirements.

{key:tab}

I explained obligations and calendared reporting dates.

snippets.name: Redetention Watch Noted
snippets.html:
I documented a risk of redetention by immigration authorities.

{key:tab}

I set monitoring reminders and identified potential pre‑custody legal options.
